Sentencas: Lowering the cell operation temperature to the intermediate temperature range of 600-700 degrees C allows the use of cheaper and more conductive metallic interconnect materials instead of ceramics.
Titulo: Influence of post-treatments on the contact resistance of plasma-sprayed La0.8Sr0.2MnO3 coating on SOFC metallic interconnector

Sentencas: Stainless steel is considered to be one of the most promising candidate materials owing to its adaptable thermal expansion coefficient and low price.
Titulo: Influence of post-treatments on the contact resistance of plasma-sprayed La0.8Sr0.2MnO3 coating on SOFC metallic interconnector

Sentencas: However, its lifetime is limited owing to the insulating oxide scale which forms on the steel surface and the degradation of the cathode performance due to the vaporization of the chromia-containing oxide scale.
Titulo: Influence of post-treatments on the contact resistance of plasma-sprayed La0.8Sr0.2MnO3 coating on SOFC metallic interconnector

Sentencas: In order to reduce the degradation of the cell performance, an effective protective layer needs to be developed.
Titulo: Influence of post-treatments on the contact resistance of plasma-sprayed La0.8Sr0.2MnO3 coating on SOFC metallic interconnector

Sentencas: To this end, in this study, an LSM (La(0.8)Sro(2)MnO(3))
Titulo: Influence of post-treatments on the contact resistance of plasma-sprayed La0.8Sr0.2MnO3 coating on SOFC metallic interconnector

Sentencas: coating was deposited by the plasma spraying method.
Titulo: Influence of post-treatments on the contact resistance of plasma-sprayed La0.8Sr0.2MnO3 coating on SOFC metallic interconnector

Sentencas: The solid-state reaction method was used to synthesize the LSM powders prior to the plasma spraying.
Titulo: Influence of post-treatments on the contact resistance of plasma-sprayed La0.8Sr0.2MnO3 coating on SOFC metallic interconnector

Sentencas: Uniform and dense coatings of LSM were deposited on stainless steel by plasma spraying.
Titulo: Influence of post-treatments on the contact resistance of plasma-sprayed La0.8Sr0.2MnO3 coating on SOFC metallic interconnector

Sentencas: The post surface treatment with plasma and thermal annealing was found to improve the crystallinity and porosity of the coating itself, but increased the contact resistance.
Titulo: Influence of post-treatments on the contact resistance of plasma-sprayed La0.8Sr0.2MnO3 coating on SOFC metallic interconnector

Sentencas: The variation of the stoichiometry, degree of crystallinity and nature of the interface were investigated, in an attempt to explain the conductivity behavior of the plasma-sprayed LSM coating after post-treatment.
